content: During the quarter we had two customers greater than 10% of revenue at 12% and 11% For the September quarter, our GAAP gross margin was a company record at 53.2%, which includes $16.9 million of intangible asset amortization and $1 million of share-based compensation costs. GAAP operating expenses in the September quarter were $137.5 million, which includes share-based compensation of $34.6 million, acquisition related costs of $10.6 million consisting of intangibles amortization and transaction costs, amortization of prepaid development costs of $2.5 million and restructuring-related costs of $1.4 million.
